data_part_name: 12" x 12" Louvered Gable End Vent Flush Mount
data_description: Louvered Gable End Vents are made of 16 ounce copper or stainless steel. There are many standard sizes and mounting styles available. Louvers are fixed and the vent is screened to keep insects and animals out. Both copper and stainless steel look great and last much longer than standard aluminum and plastic vents.
data_features:
Louvered gable wall vent
Made of 16 ounce copper, or stainless steel
Fixed Louvers spaced 2" apart
Many sizes to choose from (custom sizes are available)
Includes screen to keep insects and animals out
data_additional_info: Which Mounting Style? Thunderbird Products' vents come in two different mounting styles. The flush mount should be purchased if the siding of your building is already installed, or if your building is brick or stone. The stucco mount model has a flashing and is meant to be installed prior to the siding installation. This mount can best be used with stucco, or wood / vinyl siding (stucco mount vents must be installed underneath siding and water-proofing).

data_part_name: 4" Dryer Vent Flush Mount with Flapper
data_description: Dryer Vent / Exhaust Vent comes in 4", 6", 8", 10", and 12" diameter sizes. Can be used for clothes dryer vent exhaust, bathroom fan exhaust, stove or kitchen fan exhaust, and more. The hood design keeps the elements from getting in while allowing airflow out. Can be configured with a one way damper, a screen, or both. Available in two mounting styles flush mount and stucco mount. Available in Copper, Stainless Steel, and Hammered Copper materials. For more information please see product descriptions and drawings below.
data_features:
Hooded Wall Vent
Perfect for dryer, bathroom, kitchen, and stove vent applications.
Made of 16 ounce Copper, Hammered Copper, or Stainless Steel
Flush and Stucco mount models available
Available with one way air damper and/or screen
Connection Pipe Length is 8" (standard)
data_additional_info: Dryer Vent Note: If you are using this product to vent a dryer it should not be ordered with a screen. Order with flapper only. A screen can catch the lint from your dryer causing a fire hazard.
data_part_number_note: All part numbers available in Stainless Steel and Hammered Copper. Prefix part number with "S" or "HC" for corresponding material. Example: "SWDV10F" or "HCWDV10F", etc.

data_part_name: 1" Copper Solar Flashing
data_description: Our new Solar Roof Flashing product is designed for use with mounting roof solar paneling. It is available in several sizes and materials to match your roofing needs. Available in Copper, Stainless Steel, Galvanized, Aluminum, and Bonderized Metal.
data_features:
Low profile seamless flashing
Standard size for 1" diameter post
Includes EPDM rubber grommet
Available in copper, aluminum, stainless, galvanized, or bonderized steel
data_additional_info: Learn more about Solar Flashings.

data_part_name: 2" No-Hub Commercial Bottom Outlet Roof Drain with Overflow
data_product_name: Commercial Bottom Outlet Roof Drain with Overflow
data_description: Made of strong 20 ounce sandblasted copper for great membrane adhesion. Seamless flashing and drain basin. New commercial application dual bowl, dual clamp ring, and dual grate design. Comes with strong ABS dome strainer. 2", 3", 4", and 6" sizes available. Design allows for flashing to nail down directly to roof, no need to sump the drain assembly. Copper outperforms the competition because copper does not rust and does not melt.
data_features:
Area roof drain with built in dual bowl overflow drain
20 ounce copper, dual 10" diameter seamless basin
Sandblasted for excellent membrane adhesion
Dual grate, dual clamp ring, sump-less design
2", 3", 4", or 6" bronze no hub fitting
ABS dome strainer included, optional cast aluminum strainer
Manufactured in the USA by Thunderbird Products
data_additional_info: Note on Fittings: Two types of fittings are available. A threaded adapter fitting is used primarily with 2" PVC pipe applications. The threads on the bronze fittings are male and can be attached to a threaded female PVC adapter. A no hub fitting is the standard fitting used in the industry. With this fitting a rubber coupling is used to connect the drain to the drainage pipe.

data_part_name: 2" Male Threaded Commercial Bottom Outlet Roof Drain with Overflow
data_product_name: Commercial Bottom Outlet Roof Drain with Overflow
data_description: Made of strong 20 ounce sandblasted copper for great membrane adhesion. Seamless flashing and drain basin. New commercial application dual bowl, dual clamp ring, and dual grate design. Comes with strong ABS dome strainer. 2", 3", 4", and 6" sizes available. Design allows for flashing to nail down directly to roof, no need to sump the drain assembly. Copper outperforms the competition because copper does not rust and does not melt.
data_features:
Area roof drain with built in dual bowl overflow drain
20 ounce copper, dual 10" diameter seamless basin
Sandblasted for excellent membrane adhesion
Dual grate, dual clamp ring, sump-less design
2", 3", 4", or 6" bronze no hub fitting
ABS dome strainer included, optional cast aluminum strainer
Manufactured in the USA by Thunderbird Products
data_additional_info: Note on Fittings: Two types of fittings are available. A threaded adapter fitting is used primarily with 2" PVC pipe applications. The threads on the bronze fittings are male and can be attached to a threaded female PVC adapter. A no hub fitting is the standard fitting used in the industry. With this fitting a rubber coupling is used to connect the drain to the drainage pipe.

Parapet Wall Overflow Drain
16 ounce copper flashing
Overflow outlet is 2" above the break
2", 3", or 4" bronze no hub fitting
Manufactured in the USA by Thunderbird Products

data_part_name: 2" No-Hub TPO-Clad Stainless Steel Side Outlet Roof Drain with Overflow
data_product_name: TPO or PVC-CLAD Stainless Steel Side Outlet Roof Drain with Overflow
data_description: TPO or PVC-Clad Stainless Steel Side Outlet Roof Drain with seamless flashing, drain basin and integrated overflow. Heat weld TPO or PVC membrane directly to the drain flashing. Comes with strong ABS dome strainer, but also available with optional Flat Grate. 2", 3", and 4" sizes available.
data_features:
Seamless Basin
TPO or PVC-Clad Stainless Steel Side Outlet Drain
2", 3", or 4" bronze fitting
Heavy duty ABS dome strainer. Also available with optional Flat Grate
10" diameter basin
Heat weld directly to the TPO or PVC-Clad drain flashing
Manufactured in the USA by Thunderbird Products
data_additional_info: Note on Fittings: A no-hub fitting is the standard fitting used in the industry. With this fitting, a rubber coupling is used to connect the drain to the drainage pipe.
data_part_number_note: For PVC part numbers, simply replace TPO with PVC, ex. TPO-RDCB2NH becomes PVC-RDCB2NH. Also, available with optional Flat Grate.

data_description: Made of strong 20 ounce sandblasted copper for great membrane adhesion. Seamless flashing and drain basin. Second pipe fitting for overflow application. Comes with strong ABS dome strainer. 2", 3", 4", and 6" sizes available. Copper outperforms the competition because copper does not rust and does not melt.
data_features:
Area roof drain with built in overflow drain
20 ounce copper, 10" diameter seamless basin
Sandblasted for excellent membrane adhesion
Second pipe and fitting for overflow application (2" raised pipe)
2", 3", 4", or 6" bronze no hub fitting
ABS dome strainer
Manufactured in the USA by Thunderbird Products
data_additional_info: Note on Fittings: Two types of fittings are available. A threaded adapter fitting is used primarily with 2" PVC pipe applications. The threads on the bronze fittings are male and can be attached to a threaded female PVC adapter. A no hub fitting is the standard fitting used in the industry. With this fitting a rubber coupling is used to connect the drain to the drainage pipe.

data_part_name: 2" No-Hub TPO-Clad Stainless Steel Through Wall Parapet Drain with Overflow
data_product_name: TPO or PVC-Clad Stainless Steel Through Wall Parapet Roof Drain with Overflow
data_description: Through wall parapet roof drain with overflow comes in a variety of sizes. Heat weld the TPO membrane directly to the drain. Fast and easy installation. Cast Aluminum Powder Coated Dome Strainer is included.
data_features:
TPO or PVC-Clad Stainless Steel flashing attached to through wall spout
Available with 2", 3", and 4" outlets with overflow
Cast Aluminum Powder Coated Dome Strainer included
Manufactured in the USA by Thunderbird Products
data_part_number_note: For PVC part numbers, simply replace TPO with PVC, ex. TPORDCB2NH becomes PVCRDCB2NH

data_description: Through wall parapet roof drain comes in a variety of sizes. Heat weld the TPO membrane directly to the drain. Fast and easy installation. Cast Aluminum Powder Coated Dome Strainer is included.

Available with 2", 3", and 4" outlets
Also available with overflow
Cast Aluminum Powder Coated Dome Strainer included
Manufactured in the USA by Thunderbird Products

data_part_name: 2" No-Hub Parapet Overflow Drain
data_description: Parapet Overflow Drain can be used in conjunction with our stand alone drains or by itself. With standard break the drain outlet is 2" off the roof (can be made to specifications). Made of 16 oz. sandblasted copper for excellent membrane adhesion. Available in bonderized steel.
data_features:
Parapet Wall Overflow Drain
16 ounce copper flashing
Overflow outlet is 2" above the break
2", 3", or 4" bronze no hub fitting
Manufactured in the USA by Thunderbird Products
data_part_number_note: Also available in Bonderized Steel. Prefix part number with "B-". Example: "B-OFPP2NH", etc...

data_part_name: 24" Marine Grade 316 Stainless Steel Linear Thin Membrane Drain
data_product_name: Marine Grade 316 Stainless Steel Linear Thin Membrane Drain
data_description: The Marine Grade Linear Thin Membrane Drain comes in a variety of sizes from 24" - 60" in length. It has a drop-in, 316 Marine Grade stainless steel grate for easy cleaning and is great for showers, floor drains, & other drain assemblies. The Marine Grade Linear Thin Membrane Drain is an ICC-ES Listed Product.
data_features:
Designed for linear shower drains in bathroom or deck applications
Comes with Drain Flashing, Trench, Grate, & Filter Basket*
Available in 24", 30", 36", 48", & 60" lengths
Made of 316 Marine Grade Stainless Steel
2" Outlet in Center of Trench
ICC-ES Listed Product
100% Made in the USA

data_part_name: 24" Marine Grade Linear Shower Drain with Standard Grate (Trench and Grate Only)
data_product_name: Marine Grade 316 Stainless Steel Linear Shower Drain (Trench and Grate Only)
data_description: The Marine Grade Linear Shower Drain (Trench and Grate Only) comes in a variety of sizes from 24" - 60" in length. It has a drop-in, 316 Marine Grade stainless steel grate for easy cleaning and is great for showers, floor drains, & other drain assemblies. The Marine Grade Linear Shower Drain (Trench and Grate Only) is an ICC-ES Listed Product.
data_features:
Designed for linear shower drains in bathroom or deck applications
Comes with Drain Trench, Grate, Filter Basket & Height Adjuster (Copper Drain Body Not Included)*
Available in 24", 30", 36", 48", & 60" lengths
Made of 316 Marine Grade Stainless Steel
2" Outlet in Center of Trench
ICC-ES Listed Product
100% Made in the USA
data_additional_info: *This is the standalone Drain Trench and drop-in Grate with Filter Basket. THIS ITEM DOES NOT INCLUDE A COPPER DRAIN BODY. You will need to have a proper drain body in order to install this product with a waterproofing membrane.

data_part_name: 2" No Hub Adjustable Bowl Deck Drain with 5" Round Nickel Bronze Grate
data_description: This is our new Adjustable 5" Bowl Deck Drain. The Nickel Bronze 5" x 5" Square or 5" Round grate are casted from nickel and bronze. It is an ideal drain for both tile and concrete applications containing weep holes incorporated into the design to allow moisture to drain. The strainer can adjust in height from 1" to 3".
data_features:
Tile and Concrete Deck Drain
16 ounce copper flashing
Available with optional copper elbow
2" or 3" Bronze No Hub Fitting
Two Grates to choose from
5" x 5" Square Nickel Bronze grate (available in Chrome and Oil Rubbed Bronze)
5" Round Nickel Bronze grate (available in Chrome and Oil Rubbed Bronze)
Strainer adjusts from 1" to 3" in height (Additional Grate Extenders available for purchase here.)
data_optionalGrateFinishes:
Nickel
Oil Rubbed Bronze
Polished Chrome

data_description: Stainless steel Adjustable Commercial Tile Deck Drain uses a spun stainless steel drain basin and flashing made of 26 gauge stainless steel. Grate sizes are 6"x6" square or 6" round brass. Grate height is adjustable from 1" to 2.25" (Additional Grate Extenders available for purchase). Weep holes incorporated into the design allow for moisture to drain.
data_features:
26 gauge spun stainless steel flashing
Grate height is adjustable from 1" to 2.25" (Additional Grate Extenders available for purchase)
2", 3", or 4" Bronze No Hub Fitting
Two Grates to choose from
6" x 6" Square brass grate
6" round brass grate
Weep holes for concrete and tile moisture drainage
Manufactured in the USA by Thunderbird Products
data_optionalGrateFinishes:
Nickel
Oil Rubbed Bronze
Polished Chrome

data_part_name: 24" Stainless Steel Ember-Resistant Inspection Vent/Linear Soffit Vent
data_product_name: Stainless Steel Ember-Resistant Inspection Vent/Linear Soffit Vent
data_description: Rigorously tested to ASTM standards to prevent ember intrusion through the inspection vent. Fabricated from 316 marine grade stainless steel. Available in lengths of 24", 36", 48", 60". Custom sizes and materials available.

Screened ember-resistant linear soffit inspection vent
Made of 316 marine grade stainless steel
Proprietary mesh allows free airflow while mitigating ember intrusions

Great for venting balcony decks while allowing access for regular maintenance and inspections

data_part_name: 12" Round Louvered Gable Wall Vent Flush Mount
data_description: Louvered Gable End Vents are made of 16 ounce copper or stainless steel. There are many standard sizes and mounting styles available. Louvers are fixed and the vent is screened to keep insects and animals out. Both copper and stainless steel look great and last much longer than standard aluminum and plastic vents.
data_features:
Made of 16 ounce copper, or stainless steel
Fixed Louvers spaced 2" apart
Many sizes to choose from (custom sizes are available)
Includes screen to keep insects and animals out
data_additional_info: Which Mounting Style? Thunderbird Products' vents come in two different mounting styles. The flush mount should be purchased if the siding of your building is already installed, or if your building is brick or stone. The stucco mount model has a flashing and is meant to be installed prior to the siding installation. This mount can best be used with stucco, or wood / vinyl siding (stucco mount vents must be installed underneath siding and water-proofing).

Under eave and soffit dryer vent cap / exhaust vent cap
Made of strong 16 ounce copper, hammered copper, or stainless steel
Available in 4", 6", and 8" sizes
One way flapper allows air out while keeping the elements from coming in
data_part_number_note: For Stainless Steel and Hammered Copper part numbers, simply include S or HC at the beginning of the part number, ex. WUEDV4 becomes SWUEDV4 or HCWUEDV4.

data_part_name: 12W" x 18H" Tombstone Louvered Gable Wall Vent Flush Mount
data_description: Tombstone Louvered Gable Wall Vents are made of 16 ounce copper or stainless steel. There are many standard sizes and mounting styles available (please choose below). Louvers are fixed and the vent is screened to keep insects and animals out. Both copper and stainless steel look great and last much longer than standard aluminum and plastic vents.
data_features:
Louvered Tombstone Gable Wall/End Vent
Available in many sizes
Made of strong 16 ounce copper, hammered copper, and stainless steel
Copper or Stainless Steel mesh screen
Available in flush mount and stucco mount configurations
Fixed louvers spaced 2" apart
data_additional_info: Which Mounting Style? Thunderbird Products' vents come in two different mounting styles. The flush mount should be purchased if the siding of your building is already installed, or if your building is brick or stone. The stucco mount model has a flashing and is meant to be installed prior to the siding installation. This mount can best be used with stucco, or wood / vinyl siding (stucco mount vents must be installed underneath siding and water-proofing).

data_part_name: 14W" x 5H" Foundation - Basement Vent Flush Mount
data_description: Screen Wall Vent available in two mounting styles and can be made any size. Great for foundation venting and basement venting. Can be made out of copper or stainless steel.
data_features:
Screened wall vent
Made of 16 ounce copper or stainless steel.
Mesh patterned screen (diamond or square depending on production availability)
Stucco and Flush mount models
Great for venting foundations venting, soffit venting, or basement vents
data_additional_info: Which Mounting Style? Thunderbird Products' metal foundation vents come in two different mounting styles. The flush mount should be purchased if the siding of your building is already installed, or if your building is brick or stone. The stucco mount model has a flashing is meant to be installed prior to the siding installation. This mount can best be used with stucco, or wood / vinyl siding (stucco mount vents must be installed underneath siding and water-proofing).

Louvers are fixed and the vent is screened to keep insects and animals out. Both copper and stainless steel look great and last much longer than standard aluminum and plastic vents.
data_features:
Louvered gable wall vent
Made of 16 ounce copper, or stainless steel
Fixed Louvers spaced 2" apart
Many sizes to choose from (custom sizes are available)
Includes screen to keep insects and animals out
data_additional_info: Which Mounting Style? Thunderbird Products' vents come in two different mounting styles. The flush mount should be purchased if the siding of your building is already installed, or if your building is brick or stone. The stucco mount model has a flashing and is meant to be installed prior to the siding installation. This mount can best be used with stucco, or wood / vinyl siding (stucco mount vents must be installed underneath siding and water-proofing).

data_part_name: 4" Low Profile Louvered Dryer Vent - Exhaust Vent Flush Mount
data_product_name: Low Profile Louvered Dryer Vent - Exhaust Vent
data_description: Louvered metal dryer vent out of copper, stainless steel, and hammered copper. Available in 4", 6", 8", 10", and 12" sizes. Great for clothes dryer vent, bathroom fan vent, kitchen vent, and stove exhaust vents. Low profile design sits flush with building siding. Available in two different mounting styles.
data_features:
Louvered wall dryer vent and exhaust vent
Made of strong 16 ounce copper, hammered copper, or stainless steel
Great for venting a dryer, bathroom fan, or stove vent hood.
One way louvers only allow air out, keeping the elements from getting in.
Pipe extends 8" in length (standard)
data_additional_info: Which Mounting Style? Thunderbird Products' vents come in two different mounting styles. The flush mount should be purchased if the siding of your building is already installed, or if your building is brick or stone. The stucco mount model has a flashing and is meant to be installed prior to the siding installation. This mount can best be used with stucco, or wood / vinyl siding (stucco mount vents must be installed underneath siding and water-proofing).

data_part_name: 4" Dryer Vent Flush Mount with Flapper
data_description: Dryer Vent / Exhaust Vent comes in 4", 6", 8", 10", and 12" diameter sizes. Can be used for clothes dryer vent exhaust, bathroom fan exhaust, stove or kitchen fan exhaust, and more. The hood design keeps the elements from getting in while allowing airflow out. Can be configured with a one way damper, a screen, or both. Available in two mounting styles flush mount and stucco mount. Available in Copper, Stainless Steel, and Hammered Copper materials. For more information please see product descriptions and drawings below.
data_features:
Hooded Wall Vent
Perfect for dryer, bathroom, kitchen, and stove vent applications.
Made of 16 ounce Copper, Hammered Copper, or Stainless Steel
Flush and Stucco mount models available
Available with one way air damper and/or screen
Connection Pipe Length is 8" (standard)
data_additional_info: Dryer Vent Note: If you are using this product to vent a dryer it should not be ordered with a screen. Order with flapper only. A screen can catch the lint from your dryer causing a fire hazard.
data_part_number_note: All part numbers available in Stainless Steel and Hammered Copper. Prefix part number with "S" or "HC" for corresponding material. Example: "SWDV10F" or "HCWDV10F", etc.

data_part_name: 4" Low Profile Roof Exhaust Vent in Copper

Low Profile Roof Exhaust Vent
Stainless Steel and Copper Low Profile Roof Exhaust Vent
Made of strong 16 ounce copper or stainless steel
Mesh screen to keep unwanted elements out
Available in 4", 6", 8", and 10" sizes
Works on all roof pitches
Connection pipe is made of stainless steel and is 4" in length

data_part_name: 4" Rooftop Dryer Vent
data_description: Roof Vent Cap for use with clothes dryer, bathroom fan, stove and kitchen exhaust and more. Available for up to 12" diameter pipe. Can be ordered with a one way damper and / or screen. Made out of copper, stainless steel, or hammered copper.
data_features:
Roof Vent Cap
Made of 16 ounce copper or stainless steel
Can be used on flat or pitched roofs
Perfect application for clothes dryer vent, stove exhaust fan, and bathroom fan vents
Available in 4", 6", 8", 10", and 12" diameter pipe sizes
Configurable with one way air damper and/or screen
Pipe connection length is 4" (standard)
Pipe connection is made of stainless steel, preventing electrolysis
data_additional_info: Dryer Vent Note: If you are using this product to vent a dryer it should not be ordered with a screen. Order with flapper only. A screen can catch the lint from your dryer causing a fire hazard.

data_part_name: 1.5" Copper Vent Stack
data_description: Our Copper Vent Stack is available in many sizes. Made for applications in which the connection to the vent stack is made below the roof line. Manufactured out of strong 16 ounce copper. Pitched to customer's specifications.
data_features:
Copper Vent Stack / Cap
Made of strong 16 ounce copper
Available with 1.5", 2", 3", and 4" bronze fittings
12" copper stack
Pitched to customer specifications
data_additional_info: This vent stack is designed for an application in which the pipe connection is made below the roof line. If your vent pipe is already coming up through your roof line please look at our Vent Pipe Flashing with Fernco Coupling or the Roof Jack Vent.

data_part_name: 24" Marine Grade 316 Stainless Steel Linear Thin Membrane Drain
data_product_name: Marine Grade 316 Stainless Steel Linear Thin Membrane Drain
data_description: The Marine Grade Linear Thin Membrane Drain comes in a variety of sizes from 24" - 60" in length. It has a drop-in, 316 Marine Grade stainless steel grate for easy cleaning and is great for showers, floor drains, & other drain assemblies. The Marine Grade Linear Thin Membrane Drain is an ICC-ES Listed Product.
data_features:
Designed for linear shower drains in bathroom or deck applications
Comes with Drain Flashing, Trench, Grate, & Filter Basket*
Available in 24", 30", 36", 48", & 60" lengths
Made of 316 Marine Grade Stainless Steel
2" Outlet in Center of Trench
ICC-ES Listed Product
100% Made in the USA

data_part_name: 30" Linear Shower Drain with Standard Grate (Trench and Grate Only)
data_product_name: Linear Shower Drain (Trench and Grate Only)
data_description: The Linear Drain Grate comes in a variety of sizes from 30" - 60" in length. It has a drop-in, 304 grade, stainless steel grate for easy cleaning and is great for showers, floor drains, & other drain assemblies. The Linear Drain Grate is an ICC-ES Listed Product.
data_features:
Designed for linear shower drains in bathroom or deck applications
Comes with Drain Trench, Grate, & Filter Basket (Copper Drain Body Not Included)*
Available in 30", 36", 48", & 60" lengths
Made of 304 Grade Stainless Steel
2" Outlet in Center of Grate
ICC-ES Listed Product
data_additional_info: *This is the standalone Drain Trench and drop-in Grate with Filter Basket. THIS ITEM DOES NOT INCLUDE A COPPER DRAIN BODY. You will need to have a proper drain body in order to install this product with a waterproofing membrane.

data_description: The Linear Drain Grate comes in a variety of sizes from 30" - 60" in length. It has a drop-in, 304 grade, stainless steel grate for easy cleaning and is great for showers, floor drains, & other drain assemblies. The Linear Drain Grate is an ICC-ES Listed Product.
data_features:
Designed for linear shower drains in bathroom or deck applications
Comes with Drain Trench, Grate, & Filter Basket (Copper Drain Body Not Included)*
Available in 30", 36", 48", & 60" lengths
Made of 304 Grade Stainless Steel
2" Outlet in Center of Grate
ICC-ES Listed Product
data_additional_info: *This is the standalone Drain Trench and drop-in Grate with Filter Basket. THIS ITEM DOES NOT INCLUDE A COPPER DRAIN BODY. You will need to have a proper drain body in order to install this product with a waterproofing membrane.

data_part_name: Clamping Ring for Roof Drain
data_description: The Roof Drain Clamping Ring is a membrane clamp for use with any of our copper or stainless roof drains, making for a sturdy installation.
data_features:
Membrane Clamp for use with any of our copper and stainless roof drains
Made of strong powder coated aluminum
Fastens with 6 stainless steel screws (provided)
6 drainage channels on top side of ring
Your waterproofing clamps securely between the drain and membrane clamp
For use with PVC, TPO, and other single ply membranes

data_part_name: 2" No-Hub Commercial Bottom Outlet Roof Drain with Overflow
data_product_name: Commercial Bottom Outlet Roof Drain with Overflow
data_description: Made of strong 20 ounce sandblasted copper for great membrane adhesion. Seamless flashing and drain basin. New commercial application dual bowl, dual clamp ring, and dual grate design. Comes with strong ABS dome strainer. 2", 3", 4", and 6" sizes available. Design allows for flashing to nail down directly to roof, no need to sump the drain assembly. Copper outperforms the competition because copper does not rust and does not melt.
data_features:
Area roof drain with built in dual bowl overflow drain
20 ounce copper, dual 10" diameter seamless basin
Sandblasted for excellent membrane adhesion
Dual grate, dual clamp ring, sump-less design
2", 3", 4", or 6" bronze no hub fitting
ABS dome strainer included, optional cast aluminum strainer
Manufactured in the USA by Thunderbird Products
data_additional_info: Note on Fittings: Two types of fittings are available. A threaded adapter fitting is used primarily with 2" PVC pipe applications. The threads on the bronze fittings are male and can be attached to a threaded female PVC adapter. A no hub fitting is the standard fitting used in the industry. With this fitting a rubber coupling is used to connect the drain to the drainage pipe.

data_part_name: 2" Stainless Steel Insert Roof Drain
data_description: 316 grade stainless steel seamless drain basin with insert outlet. Designed for fast and watertight installations. Available for 2", 3", and 4" existing pipe sizes. Includes Heavy Duty ABS Dome Strainer, Stainless Steel Clamping Ring, and two O-Rings to prevent back-flow.
data_features:
Stainless Steel Insert Roof Drain
For 2",3" and 4" existing pipe sizes
316-Grade Stainless Steel flange
Includes Heavy Duty ABS Dome Strainer. Also, available with optional Cast Aluminum Dome.
Includes Stainless Steel Clamping Ring
Includes two O-Rings to prevent backflow
Manufactured in the USA by Thunderbird Products
data_part_number_note: Also available with optional Cast Aluminum Dome

data_part_name: 2" No-Hub TPO-Clad Stainless Steel Side Outlet Roof Drain
data_product_name: TPO or PVC-Clad Stainless Steel Side Outlet Roof Drain
data_description: TPO or PVC-Clad Stainless Steel Side Outlet Roof Drain with seamless flashing and drain basin. Heat weld TPO or PVC membrane directly to the drain flashing. Comes with strong ABS dome strainer, but also available with optional Flat Grate. 2", 3", and 4" sizes available.
data_features:
Seamless Basin
TPO or PVC-Clad Stainless Steel Side Outlet Drain
2", 3", or 4" bronze fitting
Heavy duty ABS dome strainer. Also available with optional Flat Grate
10" diameter basin
Heat weld directly to the TPO or PVC-Clad drain flashing
Manufactured in the USA by Thunderbird Products
data_additional_info: Note on Fittings: A no hub fitting is the standard fitting used in the industry. With this fitting a rubber coupling is used to connect the drain to the drainage pipe.
data_part_number_note: For PVC part numbers, simply replace TPO with PVC, ex. TPO-RDCB2NH becomes PVC-RDCB2NH. Also, available with optional Flat Grate.

data_part_name: 2" TPO-Clad or PVC-Clad Insert Roof Drain
data_product_name: TPO-Clad or PVC-Clad Insert Roof Drain
data_description: TPO-Clad or PVC-Clad seamless drain basin with insert outlet. Designed for fast and watertight installations. TPO-clad metal allows easy installation by heat welding. No glue or silicon is needed. Available for 2", 3", and 4" existing pipe sizes. Includes Heavy Duty ABS Dome Strainer, Stainless Steel Clamping Ring, and two O-Rings to prevent back-flow.
data_features:
TPO-Clad or PVC-Clad Insert Roof Drain
For 2", 3", and 4" existing pipe sizes
TPO-Clad 316 stainless steel flange
Includes Heavy Duty ABS Dome Strainer. Also, available with optional Cast Aluminum Dome.
Includes Stainless Steel Clamping Ring
Includes two O-Rings to prevent backflow
Designed for fast and watertight installations. TPO-Clad metal allows easy installation by heat welding. No glue or silicon is needed.
Manufactured in the USA by Thunderbird Products

data_part_name: 2" No-Hub TPO-Clad Stainless Steel Side Outlet Roof Drain with Overflow
data_product_name: TPO or PVC-CLAD Stainless Steel Side Outlet Roof Drain with Overflow
data_description: TPO or PVC-Clad Stainless Steel Side Outlet Roof Drain with seamless flashing, drain basin and integrated overflow. Heat weld TPO or PVC membrane directly to the drain flashing. Comes with strong ABS dome strainer, but also available with optional Flat Grate. 2", 3", and 4" sizes available.
data_features:
Seamless Basin
TPO or PVC-Clad Stainless Steel Side Outlet Drain
2", 3", or 4" bronze fitting
Heavy duty ABS dome strainer. Also available with optional Flat Grate
10" diameter basin
Heat weld directly to the TPO or PVC-Clad drain flashing
Manufactured in the USA by Thunderbird Products
data_additional_info: Note on Fittings: A no-hub fitting is the standard fitting used in the industry. With this fitting, a rubber coupling is used to connect the drain to the drainage pipe.
data_part_number_note: For PVC part numbers, simply replace TPO with PVC, ex. TPO-RDCB2NH becomes PVC-RDCB2NH. Also, available with optional Flat Grate.

Comes with strong ABS dome strainer. 2", 3", 4", and 6" sizes available. Copper outperforms the competition because copper does not rust and does not melt.
data_features:
Area roof drain with built in overflow drain
20 ounce copper, 10" diameter seamless basin
Sandblasted for excellent membrane adhesion
Second pipe and fitting for overflow application (2" raised pipe)
2", 3", 4", or 6" bronze no hub fitting
ABS dome strainer
Manufactured in the USA by Thunderbird Products
data_additional_info: Note on Fittings: Two types of fittings are available. A threaded adapter fitting is used primarily with 2" PVC pipe applications. The threads on the bronze fittings are male and can be attached to a threaded female PVC adapter. A no hub fitting is the standard fitting used in the industry. With this fitting a rubber coupling is used to connect the drain to the drainage pipe.

data_part_name: 2" No-Hub Stainless TPO CLAD Outlet Roof Drain with Overflow
data_product_name: TPO or PVC-Clad Stainless Steel Bottom Outlet Roof Drain with Overflow
data_description: Seamless drain basin made of TPO or PVC-Clad Stainless Steel. Overflow connection with 2" rise. Heat weld directly to the seamless flashing for fast and easy installation. All fittings are fully soldered to ensure waterproofing.
data_features:
Seamless Basin
TPO or PVC-Clad Stainless Steel Drain
2", 3", or 4" bronze fitting.
Heavy duty ABS dome strainer
10" diameter basin
Heat weld directly to the TPO or PVC-Clad drain flashing
Manufactured in the USA by Thunderbird Products
data_additional_info: Note on Fittings: Two types of fittings are available. A threaded adapter fitting is used primarily with 2" PVC pipe applications. The threads on the bronze fittings are male and can be attached to a threaded female PVC adapter. A no hub fitting is the standard fitting used in the industry. With this fitting a rubber coupling is used to connect the drain to the drainage pipe.
data_part_number_note: For PVC part numbers, simply replace TPO with PVC, ex. TPO-RDCB2NH becomes PVC-RDCB2NH

data_part_name: Clamping Ring for Roof Drain
data_description: The Roof Drain Clamping Ring is a membrane clamp for use with any of our copper or stainless roof drains, making for a sturdy installation.
data_features:
Membrane Clamp for use with any of our copper and stainless roof drains
Made of strong powder coated aluminum
Fastens with 6 stainless steel screws (provided)
6 drainage channels on top side of ring
Your waterproofing clamps securely between the drain and membrane clamp
For use with PVC, TPO, and other single ply membranes
